Key Match Events: Three second half goals saw Argentina ease past Chile in World Cup Qualifying.
Alexis Mac Allister popped up from midfield to fire Argentina into a deserved lead.
Julián Alvarez got his name on the scoresheet with a screamer from the edge of the box.
Paulo Dybala added a third goal in injury time.
Pre-Game Insights: Argentina came into the night having won five of their opening matches.
Chile have been in a rut with just one win in their opening seven games.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Next up for the reigning champions is a qualifying showdown with Colombia, while Chile will take on Bolivia.
